column2: When selected it means that at least one molecular assay on this platform has received regulatory approval/clearance from the regulatory bodies
This is assay-dependent and, therefore, the information is for indication only

This is assay-dependent and, therefore, not shown in this directory. For many of the commercialized platforms listed here, the performance of the individual assay can be consulted in the other disease-based test directories (https://www.finddx.org/tools-and-resources/dxconnect/test-directories)
